section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the judgment and opinion for the Court to announce in number 72-914, Scheuer, Administratrix against Rhodes, and 72-1318, Krause as Administrator against Rhodes.
For reasons stated in an opinion filed this morning, the judgment took the Court of Appeals of the Sixth Circuit is reversed, and the case is remanded to the District Courts for further proceedings.
Mr. Justice Douglas took no part in the decision in this case.
